verbose_text: We could show that Siglec-G deficiency in atherosclerosis-prone Ldlr -/- mice leads to a marked reduction of atherosclerotic lesion burden as well as decreased hepatic inflammation.
evidence: Siglec-G deficiency in atherosclerosis-prone Ldlr -/-  mice leads to a marked reduction of atherosclerotic lesion burden as well as decreased hepatic inflammation
